medical_history.chief_complaint: Lethargy and abdominal pain in the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced lethargy and abdominal pain this morning, mostly located in the right lower quadrant. The pain was denied after receiving medication in the emergency department.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Breast cancer, hypertension, hypothyroidism, lymphedema post-mastectomy, atrial fibrillation on aspirin, Lyme disease, sleep apnea, history of breast reduction, tonsillectomy, appendectomy, and hysterectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Father had bladder cancer, aunt had breast cancer, both father and brother with perforated intestines.
